#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long n,l1,l2;
    cin>>n;
    l1=n%100000;
    l2=n/100000;
    int ctr1,ctr2,sum=0,i;
   while(l1>0&&l2>0)
    {
        ctr1=l1%10;
        ctr2=l2%10;
        sum+=ctr1*ctr2;
        l1/=10;
        l2/=10;
    }
    cout<<sum<<endl;
}
